Button

  1. Dashboard
  2. Components
  3. Buttons
Default Buttons

Use the .btn .btn-{color} classes.

Outline Buttons

Use the .btn .btn-outline-{color} classes.

Disabled Buttons

Add .btn-disabled classes or disabled property instead.

Button Size

Use the .btn-sm or .btn-md or .btn-lg property instead.

Icon Button

Add .btn-disabled classes or disabled property instead.

Button Size

Use the .btn-sm or .btn-md or .btn-lg property instead.
